channel.description: Recent content in git on Fake it

item.title: Git Tips
item.description: org date: 2016-07-08T 00:23:14+08:00 在bash提示符显示当前的git分支 Show the current Git branch on your Bash pro Append this to your ~/.bashrc: 1 export PS1='\[\033[01;32m\]\h\[\033[01;34m\] \w\[\033[31m\]$(__git_ps1 "(%s)") \[\033[01;34m\]$\[\033[00m\] ' Reload the changes by saying 1 source ~/.bashrc 本地SVN仓库转换成git仓库 1 git svn clone
